Game.Name: Armored Unit
Game.Plot: Armored Unit is a Strategy game, developed and published by Sammy Studios, which was released in Japan in 1999. Tidy strategy fight title as players mecha suited combatant takes to deep outer space to do battle on the grid with asteroids whizzing past in the background. A good choice of options gives plenty of potential attacks as players are coaxed and cajoled by a Captain Birdseye lookalike mentor.
